title: Linux启动我的世界失败
author: NES-Eden
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2020-8-16 21:35 编辑 

linux发行版:openSUSE (Tumbleweed)

HMCL日志:[15:03:09] [Render thread/INFO]: Environment: authHost='https://authserver.mojang.com', accountsHost='https://api.mojang.com', sessionHost='https://sessionserver.mojang.com', name='PROD'
[15:03:09] [Render thread/INFO]: Setting user: <player>
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Ooh. Shiny.

Time: 20-8-16 下午3:03
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
        at dka.<init>(SourceFile:143)
        at djw.<init>(SourceFile:426)

Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: Failed to dynamically load library: /home/zzpeng/桌面/MC/.minecraft/versions/1.16.2/natives/libglfw.so(error = null)

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content: 似乎你的文件没有下载全

replies.author: MandateOfRock
replies.txt_content: HMCL里面删除版本再重新下载试试呢?

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content:
JerryZRF 发表于 2020-8-17 10:16
尝试更新显卡驱动
我裂开了
你看日志没有
这是找不到dylib文件
